segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink, focused on her dish towel work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading over, forming that unexpected puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, the cookie jar is open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stoolâ€”wow, it's really tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach for the cookies is bold and precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below, hand up, totally in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how they're pulling this off secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful garden, so contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This setup is full of surprises around every corner.
segments.speaker: PAR
